languages.text: "Его Преосвященство был весьма отчаян в стремлении получить отпущение от жизни. Но если и Экклезиархия, и Вольный Торговец отказывают — ему остается лишь и дальше быть символом святости".

"The cardinal was quite desperate to be relieved of his mortal life. But now that both the Ecclesiarchy and the Rogue Trader have refused him, he has no choice but to remain a living paragon of holiness."
languages.original_text: "Его Преосвященство был весьма отчаян в стремлении получить отпущение от жизни. Но если и Экклезиархия, и Вольный Торговец отказывают — ему остается лишь и дальше быть символом святости".

traits.locale_text: "His Holiness was quite desperate to be relieved of his mortal life. But now that both the Ecclesiarchy and the Rogue Trader have refused him, he has no choice but to remain a paragon of sainthood."
"His Holiness was quite desperate to be relieved of his mortal life. But now that both the Ecclesiarchy and the Rogue Trader have refused him, he has no choice but to remain a paragon of sainthood."

"His Holiness was quite desperate to be relieved of his mortal life. But now that both the Ecclesiarchy and the Rogue Trader have refused him, he has no choice but to remain a living paragon of sainthood."

"The cardinal was quite desperate to be relieved of his mortal life. But now that both the Ecclesiarchy and the Rogue Trader have refused him, he has no choice but to remain a living paragon of holiness."

"The cardinal was quite desperate to be relieved of his mortal life. But now that both the Ecclesiarchy and the Rogue Trader have refused him, he has no choice but to remain a living paragon of holiness."

languages.text: "Der Kardinal wollte fast verzweifelt aus seinem sterblichen Leben entlassen werden. Doch sowohl Ekklesiarchie als auch {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} haben ihm das verweigert, und jetzt muss er ein lebendes Musterbeispiel der Heiligkeit bleiben."
languages.original_text: "The cardinal was quite desperate to be relieved of his mortal life. But now that both the Ecclesiarchy and the Rogue Trader have refused him, he has no choice but to remain a living paragon of holiness."

traits.locale_text: "Der Kardinal wollte fast verzweifelt aus seinem sterblichen Leben entlassen werden. Doch sowohl Ekklesiarchie als auch {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} haben ihm das verweigert, und jetzt muss er ein lebendes Musterbeispiel der Heiligkeit bleiben."

"Seine Eminenz wollte fast verzweifelt aus seinem sterblichen Leben entlassen werden. Doch sowohl Ekklesiarchie als auch {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} haben ihm das verweigert, und jetzt muss er ein lebendes Musterbeispiel der Heiligkeit bleiben."

languages.text: « Le cardinal semblait appeler de ses vœux la délivrance de la mort. Cependant, puisque l'Ecclésiarchie et {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} ont refusé d'accéder à sa demande, il sera contraint de continuer à vivre en tant que parangon de sainteté. »
languages.original_text: "The cardinal was quite desperate to be relieved of his mortal life. But now that both the Ecclesiarchy and the Rogue Trader have refused him, he has no choice but to remain a living paragon of holiness."

traits.locale_text: « Le cardinal semblait appeler de ses vœux la délivrance de la mort. Cependant, puisque l'Ecclésiarchie et {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} ont refusé d'accéder à sa demande, il sera contraint de continuer à vivre en tant que parangon de sainteté. »

« Son Éminence semblait désirer désespérément la délivrance de la mort. Cependant, puisque l'Ecclésiarchie et {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} ont refusé d'accéder à sa demande, il sera contraint de continuer à vivre en tant que parangon de sainteté. »

languages.text: “红衣主教非常渴望从尘世的生命中获得解脱，但无论是国教教会还是行商浪人，都拒绝了他的请求。如今，他别无选择，只能继续活下去，继续被人们视为神圣信仰的楷模。”
languages.original_text: "The cardinal was quite desperate to be relieved of his mortal life. But now that both the Ecclesiarchy and the Rogue Trader have refused him, he has no choice but to remain a living paragon of holiness."

traits.locale_text: “红衣主教非常渴望从尘世的生命中获得解脱，但无论是国教教会还是行商浪人，都拒绝了他的请求。如今，他别无选择，只能继续活下去，继续被人们视为神圣信仰的楷模。”
“主教大人非常渴望从尘世的生命中获得解脱，但无论是国教教会还是行商浪人，都拒绝了他的请求。如今，他别无选择，只能继续活下去，继续被人们视为神圣信仰的楷模。”
“主教大人非常渴望从尘世的生命中获得解脱，但无论是国教教会还是行商浪人，都拒绝了他的请求。如今，他别无选择，只能继续活下去，继续被人们视为神圣信仰的楷模。”

languages.text: «El cardenal estaba desesperado por poner fin a su vida mortal. Pero, ahora que tanto la Eclesiarquía como {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente se lo han negado, no tiene más opción que seguir viviendo como un ejemplar de santidad».
languages.original_text: "The cardinal was quite desperate to be relieved of his mortal life. But now that both the Ecclesiarchy and the Rogue Trader have refused him, he has no choice but to remain a living paragon of holiness."

traits.locale_text: «El cardenal estaba desesperado por poner fin a su vida mortal. Pero, ahora que tanto la Eclesiarquía como {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente se lo han negado, no tiene más opción que seguir viviendo como un ejemplar de santidad».

«Su Eminencia estaba desesperado por poner fin a su vida mortal. Pero, ahora que tanto la Eclesiarquía como {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente se lo han negado, no tiene más opción que seguir viviendo como un ejemplar de santidad».

languages.text: 「枢機卿猊下は、自らの死を切望していました。しかし、帝国聖教会とローグトレーダーの両者に拒まれた今、彼は生きた聖人の模範として存在し続けるしかありません」
languages.original_text: "The cardinal was quite desperate to be relieved of his mortal life. But now that both the Ecclesiarchy and the Rogue Trader have refused him, he has no choice but to remain a living paragon of holiness."

traits.locale_text: 「枢機卿猊下は、自らの死を切望していました。しかし、帝国聖教会とローグトレーダーの両者に拒まれた今、彼は生きた聖人の模範として存在し続けるしかありません」
「枢機卿猊下は、自らの死を切望していました。しかし、帝国聖教会とローグトレーダーの両者に拒まれた今、彼は生きた聖人の模範として存在し続けるしかありません」

languages.text: "Kardinal, fâni hayatından kurtulmaya ziyadesiyle hazırdı lakin hem Ekleşiarşi hem de Hür Tacir kendisine izin vermeyince artık yaşayan bir kutsiyet timsali olarak kalmaktan başka çaresi kalmadı."
languages.original_text: "The cardinal was quite desperate to be relieved of his mortal life. But now that both the Ecclesiarchy and the Rogue Trader have refused him, he has no choice but to remain a living paragon of holiness."

traits.locale_text: "Kardinal, fâni hayatından kurtulmaya ziyadesiyle hazırdı lakin hem Ekleşiarşi hem de Hür Tacir kendisine izin vermeyince artık yaşayan bir kutsiyet timsali olarak kalmaktan başka çaresi kalmadı."

"Sayın Kardinal, fâni hayatından kurtulmaya ziyadesiyle hazırdı lakin hem Ekleşiarşi hem de Hür Tacir kendisine izin vermeyince artık yaşayan bir kutsiyet timsali olarak kalmaktan başka çaresi kalmadı."
